postBootScript: git clone https://github.com/RENCI-NRIG/host-key-tools.git /root/host-key-tools; cd /root/host-key-tools/hostkey-py/; python setup.py install; cp /root/host-key-tools/host-key-tools.service /usr/lib/systemd/system; sed -i 's/ExecStart=.*/ExecStart=\/usr\/bin\/hostkeyd start -c https:\/\/comet-hn1.exogeni.net:8111\/ -s WORKFLOW -r WORKFLOWread -w WORKFLOWwrite -i NODENAME/g' /usr/lib/systemd/system/host-key-tools.service; sysctl host-key-tools.service enable; service host-key-tools.service start
